segments.text: The stale smell of old beer lingers.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: It takes heat to bring out the odor.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: A cold dip restores health and zest.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: A salt pickle tastes fine with ham.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Tacos al pastor are my favorite.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: A zestful food is the hot cross bun.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
